title: My Summer in Venice
description: Lola Reed was beyond distraught when she found out that her boyfriend, Gabe, of two years has been cheating on her since day one.The worst part? It was with her best friend, Lizzy. When her mother’s best friend called and offered Lola a summer job in Italy, Lola didn’t hesitate twice before accepting the offer. The summer job? To be one of the crew members in one of the most popular camping grounds in Venice, Italy. Teenagers flock all over the world to camp or stay in the cabins while they tour the enchanting city of Venice. It was the ultimate place to meet all different types of people and party hardcore.What Lola didn’t anticipate was her housemate Jake Worthington—the dark haired and blue-eyed Australian. Jake’s tall, handsome, sexy and undeniably heartbroken—his girlfriend died over a year ago—and still mourned her loss. Lola can’t help but be drawn towards Jake but knew she wasn’t ready to be with anyone after the disastrous relationship she had with Gabe. A sorrow-filled man and a devastated woman not wanting to be with anyone but ended up sharing one night together. That one night changed it all.
author: Pamela Ann
